/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds that add a sense of depth to the scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes stand tall, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. The road itself is lined with street lamps, standing like sentinels, ready to bathe the street in their warm glow as dusk falls. In the distance, a few buildings peek through the foliage, their details softened by the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, looking up at the sky from the comfort of their car seat. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image paints a picture of a peaceful day in a bustling city, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
